#Text=Bolin says : " You were just bluffing , right ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Other ... ways ?
#Text=How many ... times have we used these " other ways " in the past ?
#Text=" Kuvira says : " It 's not for you to worry about .
#Text=" Bolin says : " So , uh ... what does happen to all those towns and villages after we leave ?
#Text=I just realized I 'd never really ... gone back and ... checked on them .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " Those people are my loyal subjects , and they contribute to the Empire however I see fit .
#Text=Now that you 're in the inner circle , you 're going to have to accept some hard truths .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Maybe ... I 'm not really an " inner circle " kind of guy .
#Text=Or -- or maybe , we do n't take over Zaofu !
#Text=Maybe we can just -- let them be on their own , and then , " Yay !

#Text= " Kuvira says : " I did n't know your personal feelings for Opal were stronger than your loyalty to me .

column1: #Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " Hard truths , Bolin .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " Your loyalty seems to be wavering .
#Text=" Bolin says : " No -- no , I 'm totally on your side , completely , one - hundred - percent loyal .
#Text=" Korra says : " How did things get so bad between you and Kuvira ?
#Text=I thought she was your protégé .
#Text=" Suyin says : " She was more than that .
#Text=She was like a daughter to me .
#Text=I took her in when she was eight years old and nourished her talents .
#Text=Kuvira was smart , a natural leader , and quickly rose through the ranks .
#Text=I saw myself in her .
#Text=" Korra says : " What happened ?
#Text=" Suyin says : " Three years ago , after the fall of the Earth Queen , Raiko and Tenzin came to see me .
#Text="
